title: Elevating Tactical DDD Patterns through Object Calisthenics
image_de: Dorra Bartaguiz zu Beginn ihres Vortrags neben dem Pult in grünem Zip-Hoodie. Im Hintergrund ist groß der Titel der Konferenz zu lesen.
image_en: Dorra Bartaguiz at the start of her presentation standing beside the desk and wearing a green zip hoodie. The title of the conference is written in big letters in the background.
speaker: Dorra Bartaguiz

timeline.description_en: How to ensure DDD tactical patterns
Don't use else keyword / Arrow anti-pattern

timeline.description_de: Nur eine Ebene der Einrückung pro Methode
timeline.description_en: Only one level of indentation per method

timeline.description_de: Keine Klassen mit mehr als zwei Instanzvariablen
timeline.description_en: No classes with more than two instance variables

timeline.description_de: Zusammenfassung, Fragen zur Anwendung der Regeln
timeline.description_en: Summary, questions about applying the rules

quotes.text: The use of primitives for complex concepts makes the code less understandable. Like this example, without dedicating structure, we can have errors.
quotes.author: Dorra Bartaguiz

quotes.text: Ask your domain expert if there is any noun for collective or plural forms which are not directly tied to their singular counterparts.
quotes.author: Dorra Bartaguiz

quotes.text: Don't abbreviate because the abbreviation can hide the intention and the original business concept.
quotes.author: Dorra Bartaguiz

quotes.text: The drawbacks of separating data and behavior are having an anemic domain model with just structures and fields, with behavior in services.
quotes.author: Dorra Bartaguiz

quotes.text: Don't talk to strangers; only talk to intermediate friends. This is the Law of Demeter.
quotes.author: Ian Holland (cited by Dorra Bartaguiz)

quotes.text: The faster you can fail, the faster you can succeed.
quotes.author: Software Development Principle (cited by Dorra Bartaguiz)

quotes.text: Keep all your entities small. This allows us to compose them and create big things, like Lego.
quotes.author: Dorra Bartaguiz

quotes.text: If you don't think about the behavior and only the structure and data, you might miss critical parts of the design.
quotes.author: Dorra Bartaguiz
